summary: Client Sarah initiated a vision meeting and the PM asked what to call the project; no name or decisions were made and other participants (Architect, Developer, QA) did not comment.

actions.task: Propose project name options and confirm preferred name with Sarah (client)

risks.risk: No project name decided yet which may delay alignment on scope and documentation
risks.mitigation: PM to propose name options and schedule a follow-up to confirm the project name with Sarah
